memberdef.name: wiced_bt_ga_bap_is_state_transition_valid

briefdescription.para: Check if the transition results in a valid state.

parameterdescription.para: : characteristic to be written
: current ASE state
: opcode for transition
: state after the transition

simplesect.para: true if transition is valid false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *dest, uint8_t length, uint8_t type, const uint8_t *value)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_ga_bap_update_ltv

briefdescription.para: Update ltv to stream.

parameterdescription.para: : pointer to stream to store ltv data the caller has to allocate the memory before calling
: GATT Connection ID
: ltv type which is being updated
: value of ltv which is being filled

briefdescription.para: Fill codec specifc configuration.

parameterdescription.para: : pointer to stream to store codec specific configuration the caller has to allocate the memory before calling
: pointer to codec specific configuration to be filled to the stream

briefdescription.para: Parse codec specifc configuration.

parameterdescription.para: : pointer to stream to be parsed
: length of the stream
: pointer to the codec specific config structure which has to be filled, memory has to be allocated before calling

briefdescription.para: Parse metadata from the stream.

parameterdescription.para: : pointer to stream to be parsed
: length of the stream
: pointer to the metadata structure which has to be filled, memory has to be allocated before calling
: response of the parsing
: reason if parsing was not successful

briefdescription.para: Fill metadata to the stream.

parameterdescription.para: : pointer to stream to be filled, memory has to be allocated before calling
: pointer to the metadata structure

briefdescription.para: Get the bit index for the specific sampling frequency.

parameterdescription.para: : Sampling frequency for which the bit index has to be found

simplesect.para: bit_index : bit index for the sampling frequency provided

briefdescription.para: Get the bit index for the frame duration.

parameterdescription.para: : frame duration for which the bit index has to be found

simplesect.para: bit_index : bit index for the frame duration provided

briefdescription.para: Get Unicast Stream configuration for the codec configuration provided.

parameterdescription.para: : Codec config for which configuration values has to be provided
: stream configuration values for the given config

briefdescription.para: Get Broadcast Stream configuration for the codec configuration provided.

parameterdescription.para: : Codec config for which configuration values has to be provided
: stream configuration values for the given config

briefdescription.para: Calculates output sample buffer size.

parameterdescription.para: : Supported sampling rate
: Supported frame duration

simplesect.para: frame size : No. of samples in decoded data

memberdef.name: CHECK_FOR_NULL_AND_RETURN_VALUE
memberdef.initializer: if (!x) \ { \ WICED_BT_TRACE("[%s] %s is NULL\n", __FUNCTION__, #x); \ return error_return_value; \ }

briefdescription.para: Macros for NULL checking.
Macros for NULL checking.
Length in bytes for Broadcast Code.
Length in bytes for Broadcast ID.
Bit 0: 7.5 ms frame duration supported.
Bit 1: 10 ms frame duration supported.
Bit 4: 7.5 ms preferred.

detaileddescription.para: Valid only when 7.5 ms is supported and 10 ms is supported. Shall not be set to 0b1 any of (bit 5 or bit 6 or bit 7) is set to 0b1.

briefdescription.para: Valid only when 7.5 ms is supported and 10 ms is supported.

detaileddescription.para: Shall not be set to 0b1 if any of (bit 4 or bit 5 or bit 7) is set to 0b1. Bit 6: 10 ms preferred.
